scripts.unitDied:
-- Check for player deaths for i, unit in ipairs(player_units) do if lastDeadUnit() == unit then player_units[i] = player_units[#player_units] player_units[#player_units] = nil if 0 >= #player_units then clearDisplayText() setPlayerAsWinner(1) endGame() end end end
-- Check for enemy deaths for i, unit in ipairs(enemy_units) do if lastDeadUnit() == unit then enemy_units[i] = enemy_units[#enemy_units] enemy_units[#enemy_units] = nil if 0 >= #enemy_units then clearDisplayText() setPlayerAsWinner(0) endGame() end end end
